comments.comments_text: Tom Lawrence (Rangers) takes the corner kick, but Walter Benitez reads it well and stops the effort.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner kick, but [PLAYER] reads it well and stops the effort.

comments.comments_text: Rangers failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: The ball is cleared after Antonio Colak (Rangers) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. Rangers have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The ball is cleared after [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. [TEAM] have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: James Tavernier (Rangers) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.

comments.comments_text: One of the defenders reacts at the last minute to brilliantly block a pass from Antonio Colak (Rangers). The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Rangers will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Tom Lawrence (Rangers) is cleared by the opposition's defence.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is cleared by the opposition's defence.

comments.comments_text: Andre Ramalho (PSV) has tested the patience of referee Szymon Marciniak and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

comments.comments_text: A corner kick by PSV is thwarted by the well prepared Jon McLaughlin (Rangers).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A corner kick by [TEAM] is thwarted by the well prepared [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: The corner from Tom Lawrence (Rangers) is intercepted by Walter Benitez.

comments.comments_text: Cody Gakpo (PSV) looks like he will be the one to take the corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) looks like he will be the one to take the corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Cody Gakpo (PSV) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.

comments.comments_text: Ruud van Nistelrooy has made a change at the break. Xavi Simons (PSV) has come on in place of Luuk de Jong.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] has made a change at the break. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) has come on in place of [PLAYER].

comments.comments_text: It looks like Ibrahim Sangare (PSV) saw red with that tackle. Szymon Marciniak won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: It looks like [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) saw red with that tackle. [REFEREE] won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Antonio Colak (Rangers). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.

comments.comments_text: Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted a chance to a lurking Antonio Colak (Rangers), who keeps his cool and rolls the ball into the net from close range. 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! A mistake from the defence gifted a chance to a lurking [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who keeps his cool and rolls the ball into the net from close range. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: John Lundstram (Rangers) is shown a yellow card by the referee for making a challenge on his opponent, but he looks angry with the decision.

comments.comments_text: Cody Gakpo (PSV) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.

comments.comments_text: What was Philipp Mwene (PSV) thinking? He will not get away with that. The referee shows him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Xavi Simons (PSV) was quite harsh and Szymon Marciniak didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
